file_content.text: Alarms disabled in your area, but you may run into security. Engage at will.
Ah... We seem to have run into a minor complication. With very large teeth. Mind lending a hand?
Welcome, honored guests! Tonight we celebrate our glorious leader, the one and only Empress Vaylin!
Exiting the party is strictly forbidden--but, honestly, who'd ever want to cut such a fantastic evening short!
Complimentary holograms of Empress Vaylin can be picked up in the reception area. Let her light up your home today!
The moment we've been waiting for is almost here! Remember, speaking during a royal address is punishable by death.
Vaylin's on the roof. You can reach her if you hurry.
Commander. We've cracked the intel you secured earlier. Standby while I open a shortcut...
That's the server room. Lift the lockdown, and you'll be able to access the valuable data within.
You've lifted the lockdown, Commander. Pay the server room a visit, and secure Vaylin's precious data.
That's the server room. There should be valuable data within. Try to establish an uplink.
The palace is in absolute chaos.
Vaylin's guests are stampeding for the exits, and Arcann's loyalists are blasting anything that moves. The entire district is on lockdown!
I'm afraid you'll need to get creative if you want to reach the skydeck.
